thread.title_full: When the ‘Bear Hunt for Pokey’ transfixed San Francisco - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Bill Van Niekerken
title: When the ‘Bear Hunt for Pokey’ transfixed San Francisco -
text:
Photo: Bob Campbell, The Chronicle The hunters pursuing Pokey the bear tried to lure him with beer. The hunters pursuing Pokey the bear tried to lure him with beer.
For three weeks in the 1940s, San Francisco was enraptured by a bear who moonlighted as an escape artist. The hunters pursuing Pokey the bear tried to lure him with beer. The hunters pursuing Pokey the bear tried to lure him with beer.
For three weeks in the 1940s, San Francisco was enraptured by a bear who moonlighted as an escape artist.
